title: The first two partes of the actes or vnchast examples of the Englysh votaryes gathered out of their owne legenades and chronycles by Johan Bale ...
author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.
publisher: For John Bale ... and are to be solde wythin Paules chayne, at the sygne of S. John Baptist,
notes: Contains general prelims. and pt. 2 only, which has special t.p.: The second part or contynuacyon of the English votaries.
Formerly pt. of STC 1271--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
